"use client" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { MapPin, Clock, RouteIcon, DollarSign, Target, Calendar, AlertCircle } from "lucide-react" import { Card } from "../components/ui/card" import { Tabs } from "../components/ui/tabs" import axios from "axios" // Import the components we'll create next import CampaignMap from "../components/CampaignMap" import RouteTimeline from "../components/RouteTimeline" import BudgetBreakdown from "../components/BudgetBreakdown" import DebugPanel from "../components/DebugPanel" export default function CampaignResults() { const [campaignData, setCampaignData] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [error, setError] = useState(null) const [dataSource, setDataSource] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const fetchCampaignData = async () => { try { // First, try to get data from localStorage (from form submission) const storedData = localStorage.getItem("campaignData") if (storedData) { console.log("üîç Found stored campaign data in localStorage") const parsedData = JSON.parse(storedData) console.log("üì¶ Parsed stored data:", parsedData) // Log specific fields to verify data structure console.log("üìä Stored Data Details:", { businessName: parsedData.businessName, businessType: parsedData.businessType, budget: parsedData.budget, location: parsedData.location, hasRoutePlan: Boolean(parsedData.routePlan), routePlanLength: parsedData.routePlan ? parsedData.routePlan.length : 0, }) // Clear localStorage after retrieving the data to avoid stale data on refresh localStorage.removeItem("campaignData") console.log("üóëÔ∏è Cleared localStorage after retrieving data") setDataSource("localStorage") setCampaignData(parsedData) } else { // If no data in localStorage, fall back to API call console.log("‚ö†Ô∏è No stored data found, fetching from API") const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/chat/generateRoute") console.log("üåê API response data:", response.data) // Log specific fields to verify data structure console.log("üìä API Data Details:", { businessName: response.data.businessName, businessType: response.data.businessType, budget: response.data.budget, location: response.data.location, hasRoutePlan: Boolean(response.data.routePlan), routePlanLength: response.data.routePlan ? response.data.routePlan.length : 0, }) setDataSource("api") setCampaignData(response.data) } setLoading(false) } catch (error) { console.error("‚ùå Error fetching campaign data:", error) setError(error) setLoading(false) } } fetchCampaignData() }, []) if (loading) { return
Loading campaign data...
} if (error) { return
Error loading campaign data: {error.message}
} if (!campaignData) { return
No campaign data available.
} return (

Billboard Campaign Results

Optimized mobile billboard campaign for {campaignData.businessName}

{/* Data Source Indicator */}
Data source: {dataSource === "localStorage" ? "Form Submission" : "Default API"}
{/* Campaign Overview Card */}

Campaign Overview

Key details about your mobile billboard campaign

Business
{campaignData.businessName}
{campaignData.businessType}
Target Audience
{campaignData.targetAudience}
{campaignData.campaignType}
Campaign Details
{campaignData.location}
{campaignData.duration}
‚Çπ{campaignData.budget}
{/* Main Content Tabs */}
{/* Locations Section */}

Recommended Locations in {campaignData.location}

High-traffic areas where your target audience ({campaignData.targetAudience}) is most likely to be present

{campaignData.locations && campaignData.locations.map((location, index) => (

{location.name}

{location.description}

))}
{/* Timing Section */}

Optimal Timing for Maximum Visibility

Strategic time slots to reach your target audience throughout the day

{campaignData.timings && campaignData.timings.map((timing, index) => (

{timing.time}

{timing.description}

))}

Daily Visibility Heatmap

{campaignData.visibilityHeatmap && campaignData.visibilityHeatmap.map((item, index) => (
{item.time} {item.visibility}% Visibility
))}
{/* Route Plan Section */}

7-Day Route Plan

Optimized route to maximize visibility while staying within budget

Days 1-3: Morning to Midday Focus

Days 4-5: Midday to Evening Focus

Days 6-7: Evening to Late Night Focus
{/* Raw Route Plan Text (if available) */} {campaignData.routePlan && (

Detailed Route Plan

Full route plan details from the AI

{campaignData.routePlan}
 )} {/* Debug Panel to inspect the API response */}
) }
